title: Under Apron
description: black pieced square on diagonal with small embroidered rosette at point at bottom front; batik at top has two black ties and is attached with narrow pink horizontal stirp; three squares with intricate geoemtric embroidery in red, white, gold and some sequins at front bottom and sides with 1/2\" diamond above; narrow embroidery, horizontal, at center with three short tassels; knotted ties at right and left
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
